<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// isBBInRange - Returns true if the distance between specific MI and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// specific BB can fit in MI&#39;s displacement field.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"></CodeLine>
